title: Transparent & Accessible
text: MarsSwap smart contracts are open-source, and its code will be verified on BSCScan. The original devs of the protocol have no power to take your funds or change the contracts.

section.title: No imposed migrations
section.content: Decentralized platforms shouldn't be able to change the terms of the contract without your consent. We have no migrator code, and all migrations will be 100% voluntary.

section.title: Flash Loans
section.content: Arbitrage opportunities can be very profitable, but they require a large upfront investment. Flash loans obviate upfront capital requirements allowing anyone to profit from these opportunities.
